title: I'm not receiving any abroad calls although I can call stopped a week ago for no reason
content:
I got my pixel from USA and now I'm in egypt using it since January 2020 and the issue appeared as i know a week ago I'm not receiving any phone calls from abroad not even appear as missed calls while the caller keeps hearing the ring as if its ringing at my side till the end
I tried the aim card in my old HTC phone its working well and i received the calls perfectly
I made soft reset to all app setting and permissions and network also but same issue exists
i checked i have no blocked numbers (the issue is with all abroad numbers not specific one)
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
